MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL52 postcode area of Criccieth affecting properties in Porthmadog Road, High Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 9:20am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:08am on 5th March 2021
